rules.ruleString: Must be enrolled in course type {03, 04, 05, 06, 07, 11, 42, 50}

time: Second semester 2017 to First semester 2018 (', 'Off-campus Day', ')

description: Do you want to apply what you have learnt from the units in your Master's program? Do you have a good idea from your work or even an assignment which you would like to further explore? Why not consider the major project unit. This unit is designed for students who wish to undertake an application-oriented research project. The project may be related to the students' current workplace or a special area of interest. An academic staff member will supervise the major project.
